name: Ojama Fusion
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Ojama" monster by banishing monsters from your Deck as Fusion Material. If this card is in the GY except during the turn it was sent there: you can shuffle this card into the Deck and if you do, all monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK. You can only activate 1 "Ojama Fusion" per turn.
